comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I tried everything I could think of in my somewhat limited arsenal to drop David Fuller: mind games (I _did_ say limited, didn't I?), carpet tacks, a banana peel, fake siezures, the works. But it was like trying to shake a bill collector from Cheese-of-the-Month Club... I simply couldn't lose him. Last night I even dreamed I saw him in line behind me at the Royal Fork Buffet. Aaaarrgh!! (Great ride Davey!)

comments.author: Fuller
comments.body: The heat was a factor ... so when I viewed you lagging on the ascent I had to seal the deal. The debt for the Gorgonzola is minor, I trust a bill of your own will materialize in my check register soon. Buffet Patron with a score to settle, Trail-Rasta
